page.title: 19GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: In the{summer}we play{rounders}.We get into two teams.One team fields and the others bat.There are four posts someone throws the ball and the other person tries to hit it.Then they run from one post to the other if they get right round they get a{rounder.}The only ways you can be out is caught out or stumped on the back or someone stumps the post and you are run out. In{winter}the boys play football and the girls play{netball.}In{football you have to kick the ball into a net. In{netball}you have to throw the ball through a high hoop.The boys also play cricket in the summer.{Cricket}is a bit like{rounders}where you hit the ball with a bat.In the playground we play{bulldog,train tick}and{line tick {which is where you tick}each other on the back.
